answerText: atomic force microscopy or AFM (accept scanning force microscopy or SFM; prompt on partial)[10] Depression of the cantilever in an atomic force microscope may be modelled with this law, which says the force needed to extend a spring is proportional to the distance.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Columbia A, MCTC | 3 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Identify this microscopic technique that images the structure of a surface using a cantilever with a sharp tip, which is deflected by interactions with surface atoms.
